articles.description: A Russian Astronaut, Sergey Kud-Sverchkov recently shared an Instagram video from ISS which actually shows an Orange Halo around Earth. Read more to find out.
articles.content: Sergei Kud-Sverchkov, a Russian Astronaut, has shared an interesting video from the space. The video highlights how it may feel like to witness the sunrise as an astronaut. Kud-Sverchkov wrote in the… [+2118 chars]

articles.title: Hint of alien life on Venus? Scientists announce detection of rare gas phosphine - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Scientists discovered a rare gas called phosphine in Venus' atmosphere. The gas could be a possible sign of life - tiny microbes living in Venus' clouds. The amount of phosphine detected was relatively large, raising more questions about the source. Phosphine…
articles.content: Scientists discovered a rare gas called phosphine in Venus' atmosphere. The gas could be a possible sign of life - tiny microbes living in Venus' clouds. The amount of phosphine detected was relative… [+437 chars]

articles.title: Stephen Hawking's greatest contributions to science - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Renowned physicist Stephen Hawking passed away on 14 March at the age of 76 in his home in Cambridge. Hawking was one of the longest survivors of Lou Gehrig's disease which had confined him to a wheelchair at the age of 21. But that did not stop him as he wen…
